features.name: Horizontally scalable
features.text: More data than you can handle coming at you? But just for a short time, for instance between 18:00 and 20:00? No problem, just add a couple of extra services temporarily when load is high. At peak hours or peak days.

features.name: Fast time to market
features.text: We can get you to production on day 1, complete with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery. By using the cloud or modern container technologies.

features.name: Integrating
features.text: We integrate with your current JVM ecosystem. Reuse your libraries, code in your new platform and integrate with your current REST service architecture.

features.name: Get the right people
features.text: We are able to get the best developers for you, because we embrace a technology that attracts top developers. This technology takes friction and boilerplate out of the programming.

features.name: Reduce code
features.text: We were able to reduce the code by 75% at one of our clients. That's 75% less room for errors.
